Package steve.pums.assess.actions

Class Summary
AddProject Generates the form for registration of student projects
CalculateMark Checks that mark form has not already been submitted
ConfirmMark Updates project status to confirmed
ExaminerMarkerAssign Assigns a staff member as examiner marker for a project
GetStudent  
GetUser  
LoadEnterMarkForm Loads a mark form to be used by co-ordinators for entering project marks
LoadMarkForm Loads a project mark form
MarkerAssign Generates a form for marker (re)assignment
ModerateFeedback Generates a form for project comment moderation
ModerateFeedbackSubmit Updates project comments
ModeratorAssign Re-assigns project moderator
Recon2 Moves the project to the second stage of reconcilliation
Recon3 Moves a project to the third stage of reconcilliation
ReconcilliationForm Generates a form for mark reconcilliation
ReconcilliationFormSubmit Updates project with reconciled mark
RegisterProject Initiates addition of a new project to the SUMS database
ShowAllocations Retrieves list of the user's project allocations
StudentMarks Shows a list of projects the student can view marks for
StudentViewProject Displays project mark and comments to the student
SubmitMark Saves a project mark and processes status changes
SupervisorAssign Reassigns the project supervisor
ThirdMarkerAssign Assigns staff member as project third marker
ViewAudit Displays project audit trail
ViewMark Displays a project mark
ViewProject Displays project information
